name: df-cgr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccgr, copab(s0, s1, wrex(s2, cn, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s2)), cfv(cee, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s2)), cfv(cee, cv(s2))))), wceq(csu(s3, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s2)), co(co(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), cexp, nat2)), csu(s3, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s2)), co(co(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s3))), cexp, nat2)))))))
comment: Define the Euclidean congruence predicate. For details, see ~ brcgr . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jun-2013.)
